author: Byron Pulsifer
message: Your destiny isn't just fate; it is how you use your own developed abilities to get what you want.
title: Thought of the day

author: Leonardo da Vinci
message: Iron rusts from disuse; water loses its purity from stagnation... even so does inaction sap the vigour of the mind.
title: Thought of the day

author: Isaac Asimov
message: A subtle thought that is in error may yet give rise to fruitful inquiry that can establish truths of great value.
title: Thought of the day

author: Henry Van Dyke
message: Be glad of life because it gives you the chance to love, to work, to play, and to look up at the stars.
title: Thought of the day
